synopsis: After losing a bet, Keichi, Mion, Rena, Satoko and Rika parade around the town in costumes. When they come to a fork in the road, they decide to go to Yagouchi, a nearby abandoned village. Once there Keichii and Rena learn the mystery of a strange haunted quarry as they debate whether or not to check it out.

title.en: When They Cry: Cat Killing Arc
title.jp: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Special: Nekogoroshi-hen
